column1: Set up project repository,"Create new repo **pneumodetect** with standard folder structure, .gitignore, README.md, and requirements.txt. Ensure virtual environment setup instructions are clear.",setup,Week 1

Create virtual environment and install dependencies,"Set up Python 3.11 venv or Conda environment. Install torch, torchvision, pandas, numpy, matplotlib, scikit-learn, Flask, pytest. Verify import success.",setup,Week 1
Explore dataset structure and metadata,"Load RSNA/NIH dataset subset into notebook **01_eda_preprocessing.ipynb**. Inspect columns, image paths, and class distribution.",data,Week 1
Visualise class imbalance and image samples,"Plot histogram of pneumonia vs normal labels. Display montage of random X-rays using matplotlib. Document insights in notebook.",data-visualisation,Week 1

Implement preprocessing and augmentation pipeline,"Write **src/data_loader.py** to resize (224×224), normalise (ImageNet mean/std), and augment (flip/rotate). Return DataLoader object.",data-processing,Week 1
Write unit test for preprocessing pipeline,"Add **tests/test_preprocessing.py** to confirm tensor shape (batch,3,224,224) and no NaNs after transformation. Run pytest.",testing,Week 1
Implement baseline ResNet-50 model,"Create **src/model.py** using pretrained ResNet-50 with frozen layers and new classifier head (2 outputs). Include docstrings.",model,Week 1
Train baseline model on subset,"Use **src/train.py** to train 3–5 epochs on small dataset. Log loss/accuracy and save weights to **saved_models/resnet50_baseline.pt**.",training,Week 1
Evaluate baseline model performance,"In **02_train_resnet50.ipynb**, load saved weights, compute confusion matrix, ROC, precision-recall. Plot metrics.",evaluation,Week 1
Document Week 1 results and reflections,"Write **docs/week1_summary.md** summarising dataset, preprocessing, baseline metrics, and initial observations.",documentation,Week 1
Commit and push all Week 1 artifacts,"Ensure all scripts, notebooks, tests, and reports are version-controlled and pushed to GitHub main branch.",workflow,Week 1
